title: CREATE VIEW
text: In SQL, a view is a virtual table based on the result set of an SQL statement.
The CREATE VIEW command creates a view.
The following SQL creates a view that selects all customers from Brazil:

Example

CREATE VIEW [Brazil 
  Customers] AS
SELECT 
  CustomerName, ContactName
FROM Customers
WHERE 
  Country = "Brazil";

title: CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW
text: The CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW command updates a view.
The following SQL adds the "City" column to the "Brazil Customers" view:

Example

CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW [Brazil Customers] AS
SELECT CustomerName, ContactName, City
FROM Customers
WHERE Country = "Brazil";
